name: Rotating Words For WPBakery Page Builder
author: Labib Ahmed

sections.description:
Best choice to add different animated words in a sentence that changes after interval of time.It’s really awesome plugin to show different features in a single sentence to get maximum attention of user.This plugin will allow you to add interchangeable words that will replace one another in a sentence after intervals.This would allow you to display your multiple content in just one sentence and attract user to your site.

Note: This plugin requires WPBakery Page Builder Plugin.

DEMO

Features

  • Typing Effect
  • 10+ different animations
  • Multiple Animations
  • Unlimited interchangeable Words
  • Full control over text
  • Custom Styling
  • Customizable Options
  • Pure CSS3 Animations
  • 24/7 Support
